comments.body: really? I think that L89 and L90 are not satisfied at the same time. isn't it?

L90 works with or without L89, but L89 does not work even without L90, at least for me. I left L89 just in case it works for other people, although it seems to be incorrect according to the implementation and documentation of i18n.init(). Should I delete it?
yes please, I think correct typing provide correct programming.
Thank you for the comment. I removed the old lines and applied the same modification to the other parts with the same callback.
